physical_appearance:\The image shows three newspaper clippings that are pasted onto a light purple paper. There are several punched holes at its left side. \\The Great Soprano sat up and listened\\
subject_terms_1:\\Praise from Miss Hammond\\ opera singers celebrities conductors concerts
subject_terms_2:and \\Joan Hammond sings to packed audience\\ are the respective headlines of the three  newspaper clippings. The clipping on the left hand side contians a picture depicting a man playing a piano while a young lady stands and sings close by. The clipping on the upper right side features two ladies and a male sitting by a piano.\ Hammond
